One last causal inference guide for the day (phew so much coding today): how to do fuzzy regression discontinuity with #rstats, both parametrically and nonparametrically! https://t.co/NwG2QIbxx0 https://t.co/kbPpl9dH88

#sunflower 
library(tidyverse)
tibble(t = (1:2300)*2.4432, 
       x = sin(t), 
       y = cos(t)) %>% 
ggplot(aes(x*t, y*t)) +
  geom_point(size=58, alpha=.1, shape=13)+ 
  coord_equal() +
  theme_void()

#rstats #maths #creativecoding https://t.co/LIfAnLgJB7
